name: Mini Zen Garden
description:
Mini Zen Garden
Create your own mini zen garden in this calming sandbox game. Decorate your beautiful garden with a minimalistic set of objects. Share your garden with others, sit back, and relieve your day’s stress.

FEATURES
  • 🌸Use 3 different tools (Build, Rotate, Remove) to express your creativity
  • ⛩️Place down cute objects to decorate your garden
  • 🕘Gameplay time is perfect for short meditation
  • 🎶An original soundtrack consisting of 2 tracks


Hi, it's SkyBrave! I make short games every month! Join my Discord channel to stay connected!
